meanings.definition: The sport or activity of kickboxing.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy watching kickboxings on TV.
meanings.sent2: Kickboxings can be a great way to stay fit.
meanings.sent3: The kickboxings tournament was full of excitement.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to kickboxings is like a flame that never goes out.
meanings.sent5: The sound of kickboxings echoes through the gym.

meanings.sent3: She practiced her kickboxings moves in front of the mirror.
meanings.sent4: In the ring, his kickboxings was poetry in motion.
meanings.sent5: The intensity of her kickboxings was unmatched.

meanings.sent1: The kickboxings ended in a draw.
meanings.sent2: I can't wait to watch the kickboxings this weekend.
meanings.sent3: The kickboxings between the rivals was fierce.
meanings.sent4: His determination in the kickboxings was like a force of nature.
meanings.sent5: The crowd cheered loudly during the kickboxings.
